headline: This Buffett favorite is one of 4 cheap stocks the ‘smartest money’ has been buying lately
summary: It’s bullish when insiders invest their own money into their companies — especially when those executives and directors have a record of savvy timing.

raw.headline: This Buffett favorite is one of 4 cheap stocks the ‘smartest money’ has been buying lately
raw.summary: It’s bullish when insiders invest their own money into their companies — especially when those executives and directors have a record of savvy timing.

headline: 1 Warren Buffett Stock to Buy Hand Over Fist in June
summary: Warren Buffett owns two energy stocks.  One of his energy investments is a more aggressive growth stock; the other is a shockingly reliable dividend stock.  Warren Buffett is the incredibly successful CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B).
